title: Nest Hub Max rolling out ‘Look and Talk’ for Google Assistant – here’s how to turn it on
content:
During this past week’s Google I/O keynote, the company officially announced the “Look and Talk” feature for the Nest Hub Max that we’ve been tracking. Now, just a few days later, that feature appears to be rolling out widely.

more…

The post Nest Hub Max rolling out ‘Look and Talk’ for Google Assistant – here’s how to turn it on appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Google Nest Hub Max is rolling out its new "Look and Talk" feature that turns on Google Assistant with just a glance.
